thread.title: Russian medalist at Olympics suspeced of doping

title: Russian medalist at Olympics suspeced of doping
text:
Russian medalist at Olympics suspeced of doping 6:18pm GMT - 00:51 
A Russian medalist is suspected of doping at the Pyeongchang Olympic Games, which could thwart Russia's attempts to emerge from a drug-cheating scandal. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Russian medalist is suspected of doping at the Pyeongchang Olympic Games, which could thwart Russia's attempts to emerge from a drug-cheating scandal. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EPNXBG
